author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: إذا حضرت تلقآء وجه إبنها تکلّمت بما ناحت به قلوب العشّاق ثمّ الملأ الأعلی وربّک علی ما أقول شهید وعلیم
translation: No sooner did she behold the face of her son, than she spoke to him such words as caused the hearts of the lovers of God, and beyond them those of the Concourse on high, to cry out and be sore pained with grief. Truly, thy Lord knoweth what My tongue speaketh. He Himself beareth witness to My words.
